notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: JTK led the laboratory diagnostic investigations, participated in data analysis and interpretation, drafted and coordinated manuscript writing and wrote the first draft. AMN participated in laboratory testing and made comments. IA participated in laboratory testing, CAN participated in laboratory testing and made comments. IEO participated in laboratory testing and made comments, JWK participated in next generation sequencing and analysis, and reviewed the first draft for content and made comments, JMD reviewed the first draft and made comments, ECM provided technical assistance, reviewed the various drafts and provided comments, and JJL participated in manuscript writing. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
